name: not for lack of it
description:
'not for lack of it' was developed for Mini Jam 77. The theme was courage.

Play as a boy in an unearthly place where life is consumed by its strange denizens trying to fulfill his self-imposed prerequisites to meeting a friend.

WASD to move. SPACEBAR to attack/interact.

If you like the game, maybe DONATE via the downloads and buy me lunch? :)
